Enrollment Requirements: PRE-REG only: Reserved for German majors.
Add Consent: Department Consent Required
title: WCAS GERMAN 346-0-20 Topics in German Literature and Culture

descriptions.name: Overview of class
descriptions.value:
This course will be taught by Sigrid Weigel. Course descriptions will be posted soon.

Sigrid Weigel is a professor of German Literature and Director of the Centre for Literature Research in Berlin. She is a member of Academia Europaea and the Modern Language Association

subject: GERMAN
